A federal grand jury in the Western District of Pennsylvania indicted five Chinese military hackers this morning in a first - of - its kind cyber economic espionage and trade secret theft case .
Hackers infiltrated the computer networks of six Pennsylvania - based corporations involved in the nuclear power , solar products and metals industries .
